apis.description: User operations such as find, sign-in or sign-up

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: The user's login name. You only need to provide either the user's login name or their email address, but you must provide one of them.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The user's email address. You only need to provide either the user's login name or their email address, but you must provide one of them.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: List of permisions required by the app to social networking platforms. See Facebook login permissions reference

parameters.name: keys[token]
parameters.description: Your app's access token for the social network platform

parameters.name: keys[secret]
parameters.description: Your app's access token secret for the social network platform (currently only required for Twitter integration)

operations.notes: Calling this api downgrades the token to an API session token
